titles.title: Enhancing Investment in Small Businesses Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a permanent exclusion of all gain on certain small business stock.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/23/2010--Introduced. Enhancing Investment in Small Businesses Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an exclusion from gross income of all gain from the sale or exchange of qualified small business stock held for more than five years.
